strange: Tells (cat) that their pelt looks like a different colour today
bloodthirsty: Talks to (cat) how best to kill prey, very enthusiastic
righteous: Makes sure (cat) is following the warrior code
Has a fight with (cat) about what's right
fierce: Is not backing down in an argument with (cat)
Is telling (cat) in great detail how they would protect them from any danger
strict: Scorns (apprentice) for not catching enough prey
charismatic: Knows what to say to make (cat) feel better
loving: Is making sure (cat) knows that they are loved
Is telling (cat) how much they cherish them
cold: Glaring at (cat) from across the camp
shameless: Is asking (cat) to tell them about how good they look
troublesome: Feels bad that they caused a problem for (cat)
empathetic: Noticed (apprentice) was struggling, and offered to help them
adventurous: Wants to explore Twoleg place with (cat)
Wants to sneak along the border with (cat)
Tells (cat) that there's so much to see in the world!
thoughful: Gave (cat) their favorite piece of prey
Took the time to help (apprentice) work through a technique they are struggling with
compassionate: Lets (cat) have the last piece of fresh kill
Gives (cat) an item they may like
childish: Is hiding behind a bush ready to pounce on (cat)
careful: Tells (cat) to get their ailment treated as soon as possible
Apologized to (cat) for possibly hurting their feelings
altruistic: Let (cat) lean on their shoulder after a recent injury
patient: Calmly explains hunting techniques to (cat) again for the fourth time today
sneaky: Is teaching (cat) how to walk without making a sound
Is showing (cat) how to sneak up on their enemies
impulsive: Crashes into (cat) while eager for patrol
Rejects (cat)'s advice without letting them finish
tidy: Is annoyed by the mess (cat) made
Is cross with (cat) for getting dirt all over the fresh-kill pile
